page.title: 05CHERRY BURTON-4
page.content: Cherry Burton has until recently had a very mobile population but with the recession it seems to have become more fixed.Perhaps it is because of this the comment is often heard at fund_ raising events "It's the same ones turning up again".There are many more female_dominated groups,particularly outside sport(YCA,Wives,Contact Group) St.Michael's (now Cherry Burton) fellowship was formed with the aim of providing mixed entertainment.Conser- vative,Labour and Liberal/SDP Party groups are all active in the village, but with a larger Tory following. However,there is one event outside the Church where both young and old gather -the village produce show,holding its 43rd. show at the school this summer. In conclusion,the Church is the strongest organisation,guaranteeing a large bank of helpers at all events.
